  Validation Report
  Conforms: True

Validation result for _sources/vocabulary/classes/geometrycollection/rules.shacl:
  Validation Report
  Conforms: False
  Results (1):
  Constraint Violation in SPARQLConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#SPARQLConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: <file:///github/workspace/_sources/vocabulary/classes/geometrycollection/S23-GeometryCollectionClass-member-onlyGeometry-sub>
  	Focus Node: ex:MyGeometryCollection
  	Result Path: rdfs:member
  	Source Constraint: [ sh:select Literal("
  			PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
  			PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
  			SELECT $this
  			WHERE {
  				$this rdfs:member ?geometry .
  				FILTER NOT EXISTS {
  					?feature geo:hasGeometry ?geometry .
  				}
  			}
  		") ]
  	Message: An instance of geo:GeometryCollection should only have outgoing rdfs:member relations to geo:Geometry instances.
